title: Freezes with stable fps and ping
body: Hello. I did not find anything solution so I will write. From some time ago I have sometimes problem like this. I have freezes when my fps is stable 60 fps and ping is 40-50. By saying freezes I mean when I attack minions I dont see animations, only hp bars are going down. Or when I click recall there is nothing happening. Some1 has solution for this :)?

replies.body: Probably something wrong with my Internet Service Provider :/ If i will get one free day I will check every step and then I will inform you, thanks for help :)
